chart_description: This chart shows the amount of variability in the time that the CPU is idle. This can be used to identify issues related to CPU utilization and performance.

dimension_descriptions.average: The average amount of time the CPU is idle in microseconds lost per second.
dimension_descriptions.max: The maximum amount of time the CPU is idle in microseconds lost per second.
dimension_descriptions.min: The minimum amount of time the CPU is idle in microseconds lost per second.
